configuration:
<% if hadoop2_historyserver %>
mapreduce.jobhistory.address <%= hadoop2_historyserver[:fqdn] %>:10020
mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address <%= hadoop2_historyserver[:fqdn] %>:19888
<% end %>
mapreduce.framework.name yarn
mapreduce.tasktracker.http.address 0.0.0.0:0
mapreduce.jobtracker.http.address 0.0.0.0:0
mapreduce.map.speculative false
mapreduce.reduce.speculative false
mapreduce.job.reduces 21
mapreduce.map.memory.mb <%= (node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>
mapreduce.map.java.opts -Xmx<%= (0.8 * node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>m -server -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -Duser.timezone=UTC -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Djava.io.tmpdir=<%= node[:hadoop2][:java_tmp] %>
mapreduce.reduce.memory.mb <%= (node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>
mapreduce.reduce.java.opts -Xmx<%= (0.8 * 2 * node[:hadoop2][:yarn][:mem_per_container] * 1024).to_i %>m -server -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -Duser.timezone=UTC -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Djava.io.tmpdir=<%= node[:hadoop2][:java_tmp] %>
mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.parallelcopies 50
mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb 256
mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor 20
mapreduce.jobtracker.handler.count 64
mapreduce.tasktracker.http.threads 20
mapreduce.task.timeout 1800000
mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress false
mapreduce.map.output.compress true
mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress.type BLOCK
mapreduce.map.output.compress.codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.Lz4Codec
mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress.codec org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec
mapreduce.jobhistory.recovery.enable true
mapreduce.jobhistory.recovery.store.class org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.v2.hs.HistoryServerFileSystemStateStoreService
mapreduce.jobhistory.recovery.store.fs.uri file://${hadoop.tmp.dir}/mapred-jobhistory-state
